Computer.name: ComSoft Workstation 1
Computer.file: Dave: Y'know what? SteveO: what Dave: Humans really are the weak point in IT, SteveO: whats brought this on Dave: I just had a word with our IT guy. It turns out he uses the same password everywhere. Dave: Fucking everywhere! Firewalls, accounts, you name it, he's only got the one... SteveO: shit man
